word: H8259 - שָׁקַף - shâqaph - shaw-kaf' - Appear - தோன்று

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - நோக்கு, பார், தோன்றியிரு, எதிராயிரு, எதிர், உதி, கண்ணோக்கு, காண்.
to overlook, to look down or out, to overhang, to look out and down
a) (Niphal) to lean over (and look), to look down
b) (Hiphil) to look down, to look down upon
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; properly to lean out (of a window), that is, (by implication) peep or gaze (passively be a spectacle): - appear, look (down, forth, out).
